title: Game Tile - Prior to Pregame
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a game with a pregame show

NOTE: If no games are available in production in the pregame state, proxy https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* using the attached json file (all games are in pregame state when this json is consumed by the app)
custom_steps: WHEN I view the game tile prior to the start of the pregame show
custom_expected: THEN the game tile shows the start time of the game

title: Game Tile - Pregame in progress
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user 

If the game states described are not available with live/real games, proxy true	https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with the json file available at this link:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/14UdlebXr0C9q2YzJ2Ce5CJKAxe2kaT9O/view?usp=sharing

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user views a game in which BOTH teams have a pregame show
AND the pregame show has started
NOTE: If using the json, observe the CIN vs. PIT game tile for this step
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game tile should display "Pre-Game Shows" and Live indicator

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user views a game in which only one team has a pregame show
AND the pregame show has started
NOTE: If using the json, observe the BOS vs. WSH and TB vs. NYY game tiles for this step
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game tile should display club 3-letter name eg. “OAK: Pre-Game Show”

title: Game Tile - Game with pregame show goes live
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user

NOTE: If a suitable game is not available in productiono, simulate the conditions for this test case by proxying https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with the attached mastapi_pregame_game_in_progress.json file. The game that pertains to this test case is the San Francisco Giants at the New York Mets.
custom_steps:
WHEN a user views a game that includes a pregame show
AND that game has entered the LIVE state
custom_expected:
THEN the game tile should show the LIVE indicator
AND there should no longer be any pregame messaging on the game tile

title: Game Tile - Final Postgame
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user 

NOTE: To simulate the conditions required for this test case, proxy https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with mastapi_prepost_shows_combos.json file available at this link (too large to attach): https://drive.google.com/file/d/14UdlebXr0C9q2YzJ2Ce5CJKAxe2kaT9O/view?usp=sharing

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user is viewing the tile of a game in FINAL state
AND both teams have a postgame show in progress

NOTE: If using the proxy file, the game to focus on for this test step is the Phillies at Marlins game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game tile should display “Postgame Shows”

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user is viewing the tile of a game in FINAL state
AND only one team has a postgame show in progress

NOTE: If using the proxy file, the game to focus on for this test step is the Minnesota Twins at Kansas City Royals game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game tile should display  club 3-letter name eg. “OAK: Postgame Show”

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user is viewing the tile of a game in FINAL state
AND any postgame show is still in progress
AND the game is a perfect game

NOTE: If using the proxy file, the game to focus on for this test step is the Baltimore at Toronto game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the perfect game badge is not displayed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user is viewing the tile of a game in FINAL state
AND any postgame show exists for the game
AND the post game show is no longer live
AND the game is a perfect game

NOTE: If using the proxy file, the game to focus on for this test step is the Chicago Cubs at Saint Louis Cardinals game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the perfect game badge is displayed

title: Game Tile - Media Off after postgame show
custom_steps:
WHEN the user views a game that included a postgame show
AND the postgame media is off

NOTE: An example game would be on April 19, 2022- San Francisco Giants at New York Mets
custom_expected: THEN the game tile shows “Final” or Final/inning

title: Featured Game - promotional copy above hero
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user on the homepage

NOTE: If games with the correct conditions are not available there are proxy files available for each condition
mastapi_prepost_shows_combos.json is available at this link (too large to attach): https://drive.google.com/file/d/14UdlebXr0C9q2YzJ2Ce5CJKAxe2kaT9O/view?usp=sharing
References to attached and linked file are in each test case

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the featured game has a pre/post game
AND only one of the teams involved provides pre/post game	

NOTE: To simulate the conditions for this test case,  make sure your favorite team is NOT Boston (If it is set to Boston, change the team then clear app data) and proxy https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with the linked mastapi_prepost_shows_combos.json
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN display Watch the [Club name] [Pre/Postgame] Show Live Now

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN neither team in the featured game is the favorite team
AND only one team has pre/post game media available

NOTE: To simulate the conditions for this test case,  make sure your favorite team is NOT Boston (If it is set to Boston, change the team then clear app data) and proxy https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with the linked mastapi_prepost_shows_combos.json
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN display Watch the [Club name] [Pre/Postgame] Show Live Now

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the favorite team is the featured game 
AND the favorite team does not have pre/post game media (and the opposing team has pre/post media available)

NOTE: To simulate the conditions for this test case, choose Boston as your favorite team and proxy https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with the linked mastapi_prepost_shows_combos.json (Once you choose Boston, this display will be cached and app data will need to be reset)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN display the game as normal

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the featured game has pre/post media available for both teams

NOTE: To simulate the conditions for this test case, choose Boston as your favorite team and proxy https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with the attached cubsRedsHeroPregame.json
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN display Watch the [Pre/Postgame] Shows Live Now

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN neither team involved in the featured game has pre/post game media available

NOTE: To simulate the conditions for this test case, choose Boston as your favorite team and proxy https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with the attached mastapi_all_games_in_pregame_state.json
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN display the game as normal

title: Featured Game- Live Indicator
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user on the homepage

To simulate the conditions for this test case, proxy https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search*	with the attached cubsRedsHeroPregame.json
custom_expected: THEN display Red “Live” Indicator followed by “[Pre/Postgame] Show[s]” LIVE NOW

title: Pregame/ Postgame - Watch Live button
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the home page

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN pre/post game is live
AND neither team is my favorite team
AND only one team has pre/post media available
AND I click the Watch Live button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN play the feed that has pre/post game media available

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN pre/post game is live
AND neither team is my favorite team
AND both teams have pre/post media available
AND I click the Watch Live button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN play the home team feed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN pre/post game is live
AND I am a single team subscriber
AND the feed I am not entitled to has pre/post media available
AND I click the Watch Live button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN play the feed to which I am entitled
